amendment.description: To provide for certain authorities of the Department of State, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3819 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3819 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3748. To provide for certain authorities of the Department of State, and for other purposes.
